title: LTB Red Sox T3, T205, T206, Cracker Jack, etc...

posts.post_title: LTB Red Sox T3, T205, T206, Cracker Jack, etc...
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Need to get a gift for a lifelong Red Sox fan who helped me out with some web design work, but won't take any $$ (the work was for my wife's non-profit organization). 

I'm looking for a nice Red Sox card for around $300-400. 

Please shoot me a PM with scans if you have anything available.

Thanks for looking!

Best,

Steve
